splitVote.description: If the room split, the passcode will be regenerated once 1/3 of players vote
splitVote.regenerateDescription: Force generate a new passcode for split lobby

matchHero.checkNextMatch: Check back soon for the next match
matchHero.goToMatchPage: Please go to the match page to check the passcode.
matchHero.reviewRules: Please review the <matchRules>match rules</matchRules> before joining
matchHero.passcodeNotice: The passcode will be available when the match starts.

rules.title: FZ99 Lounge Ruleset
rules.subtitle: Please read all rules carefully before participating in Lounge matches.

general.warning: Please read all rules before participating in Lounge. Rule violations may result in warnings or penalties.
general.joining1: A Discord account is required to join the Lounge.
general.joining2: Log in with Discord on this website to complete your registration.
general.joining3: On your first login, you can set your country and nickname.
general.joining3sub1: Your nickname should be the name you use in-game
general.prohibition1: Vulgar language or impersonation of other users is strictly prohibited.
general.prohibition2note: Violations will result in severe penalties.

ranking.title: Ranking System
ranking.note: Rankings are reset each season. GP Mode and Classic Mode have independent rankings.

match.beforeMatch1: Log in with Discord and join from the home page (first come, first served)
match.beforeMatch2: Minimum players: Classic = 12, GP = 40 (match cancelled if not met)
match.beforeMatch3: You can cancel freely before the match starts
match.whenStarts1: You will be redirected to the match page (you will receive a Discord mention if you are in the <discordLink>Discord server</discordLink>)
match.whenStarts2: If not redirected, navigate manually from the home page
match.whenStarts3: Use the passcode on the match page to join the in-game room
match.passcodeWarning: Passcode: Do not share with anyone. If streaming, hide it from view.
match.splitLobby1: Press the "Split" button on the match page
match.splitLobby2: Once 1/3 of players press the button, a new passcode will be generated
match.splitLobby3: Join the room using the new passcode
match.gpRule2: No blue bumper - if you become a blue bumper, do not control and self-destruct immediately
match.submitting1: After the match ends, submit your score from the match page
match.submitting2: Enter your placement for each race
match.submitting3: If you crashed out or ranked out, check the box for that race number
match.screenshotAllPlayersDesc: Please submit a screenshot showing your results for each race
match.screenshotFirstPlaceDesc: Please also submit a screenshot of the overall results screen
match.disconnection1: If you disconnect during a match, check "Disconnected" for that race when submitting your score
match.disconnection2: All races after the disconnection will be treated as 0 points

penalty.strikeWarning: Strikes expire after 30 days. Players have a limit of 3 strikes.
penalty.strikeDescription: Players who receive MMR penalties for quitting matches, trolling, joining late, targeting specific players, or teaming will also receive a strike.
penalty.strikeResetNote: Strike limits are reset each season.

scoreSubmission.title: Submit Your Result
scoreSubmission.moderatorDescription: Select a player and enter their score.
scoreSubmission.raceResultsDescription: Enter your finishing position for each race. If you were ranked out or crashed out, check Elim and enter your position at that time.
scoreSubmission.screenshotExample: Please take a screenshot of this screen and submit it.
scoreSubmission.screenshotFailed: Score submitted, but screenshot upload failed: {error}

screenshotUpload.individualDescription: Submit your personal score screenshot for verification
screenshotUpload.finalScoreDescription: Please take one screenshot of the screen below showing positions 1-11 and submit it.
screenshotUpload.firstPlaceAlert: If you are in 1st place, please submit the final results screenshot using the form below.
screenshotUpload.disabledMessage: The 1st place player is responsible for submitting a screenshot of the final results. This form will be enabled when you are in 1st place.
screenshotUpload.invalidFileType: Only JPG, PNG, and WebP images are allowed
screenshotUpload.fileTooLarge: File size must be less than 10MB

screenshotRequest.title: Screenshot Required
screenshotRequest.description: A moderator has requested you to submit screenshots. Please submit 2 screenshots of the following screens.

screenshotReminder.title: About Screenshots
screenshotReminder.description: If there are discrepancies in reported rankings, you may be asked to submit screenshots. Please keep the following 2 screenshots ready.
